title: Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is one of the strange dreams in which many dreamers feel confused and try to search for a clear explanation for this vision, which includes many meanings that vary between bad and good according to the dreamer, whether he is a man or a single girl, married, or pregnant. The interpretation of this vision varies depending on the scene. Such as seeing or digging a well or drinking from a well, and we will try to find some interpretations of this vision, but our site is not responsible for the interpretation of the conclusion that we will provide in any vision, because interpretations of dreams are not based on similarity between visions, but there are many elements and controls that govern This process. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream. Dream interpretation researcher Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing a well in a dream indicates marriage, knowledge, or money in general. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation Seeing yourself drinking from a well indicates good luck - God willing. Just as bathing from well water indicates that the dreamer will be able to get rid of many of the mistakes he commits. In addition to clear water emerging from the well in a dream, this indicates a good sky for the pioneer. Among people. You may be interested: Pregnancy in a dream. As for a dry well in a dream that is empty of water, this may be a sign of failure, and God knows best. Seeing a well in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried girl who sees a well in a dream, this may be a sign of her marriage - God willing - In the near future. Just like a dry well in a single girl’s dream, this may mean that there are problems facing the girl, God forbid. With the exception of the unmarried girl who sees herself falling into the well, this indicates that she will get rid of the problems she is suffering from. As for the unmarried girl, A married woman who dreams of leaving a well, this indicates that she will - God willing - leave her father’s house to get married. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Seeing a well in a married woman’s dream A married woman who sees in a dream a well filled with water, this is a good omen for the woman that she will become pregnant soon. As for a married woman who dreams of falling into a well, this indicates stability in life and success. Like a married woman who dreams of coming out of a well, this indicates that this woman will leave her husband’s house, God forbid. In general, the well in a married woman’s dream indicates the wife, so if it overflows With water, this indicates that the husband is the woman’s source of protection and security. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead Seeing a well in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees skin in a dream may be one of the signs that she will give birth - God willing - to a male child, and God knows best. Just as A pregnant woman dreams of falling into a well. This may be one of the indicators of stability and success that the woman enjoys. As for a pregnant woman who enters a well in a dream and is unable to get out of it, this indicates the presence of many problems in the woman’s life. Such as a woman who dreams of falling into a well.

title: Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream by Ibn Sirin Corn is a delicious food and can be eaten roasted or boiled and has many benefits, and seeing corn in a dream puts the dreamer in a state of anxiety for fear that it will be an annoying sight. Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing Corn in a dream indicates goodness and money that the dreamer will obtain. Green corn indicates success in scientific and practical life. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wandering in corn fields, he will obtain a lot of goodness from it. Harvesting corn in a dream is a sign of good news. Interprets Some interpreters see corn in a dream as disappointment. Interpretation of seeing corn for single people. Seeing green corn in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of an imminent relationship and marriage. Corn in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the happiness she experiences. Corn for individuals in a dream. Facts about a virtuous husband. If He sees that he is buying corn, then he will face financial difficulties. If he dreams that he is stepping on white corn, this is a sign of the many benefits that he will receive. Yellow corn indicates limited means of livelihood. Interpretation of seeing corn for a married woman When a married woman sees corn in a dream, she and her husband will receive For something that she and her husband desire. If he sees that he is buying corn, he will move to a new residence. If he sees a lot of corn in the dream, it is the amount of good that will come to him. If she sees that she is taking corn from the field, then she and her husband will have a lot of money and abundant livelihood. Interpretation of seeing corn for a man: If a man sees in a dream harvesting corn, then kindness abounds. Seeing rotten corn is a sign that bad things will happen to it. If the corn is cut from the ground before it is ripe, then this is not good. If he sees that the corn is empty, this is a sign of his generosity and generosity. Interpretation of the vision Corn for pregnant women: Corn in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will give birth to many children. If she sees that she is eating corn, she will become pregnant with twins. Corn in a dream: Pregnant women: Evidence of the imminent date of birth. Buying corn in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the fetus’s new clothes. Corn in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates The ease and ease of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about the dead eating corn in a dream. Seeing the dreamer eating corn is in a dream a sign of his good reputation with God Almighty, and God knows best. Eating the dead, but in a dream, expresses his assurance regarding the condition of his loved ones. Seeing yellow corn with a dead person in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has been liberated from Illness, sadness, and problems. Take corn. The presence of a dead person in a dream is evidence of comfort and relief from distress. Interpretation of seeing green corn in a dream. I mean, I see green corn in a dream to earn halal money. Eating green corn in a dream represents abundant nutrition. Seeing a large amount of green corn is a sign of happy life and wealth. Seeing green corn in a dream means success. The good news is that the merchant who sees green corn in his dream is a sign that he will enter into a new business from which he will earn money and in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream...a message of warning and salvation

preview.html: Seeing the sea in a dream is one of the rare visions that the dreamer sees in a dream, so he is looking for interpretations of his vision to avoid confusion, so we will provide you with interpretations of seeing the sea in a dream based on the opinion of the leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams from Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others, so follow us. The meaning of a dream about the sea According to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin says that the sea in a dream has two meanings: The first: seeing it is an abundance of sustenance and kindness, because it is a source of food with fish that benefits people, and seeing it can symbolize betrayal and evil to him. The sea is characterized by betrayal, where there is loss. Ink is like life. Seeing fish in the sea in a dream for the dreamer is a symbol of abundant goodness that the dreamer will gain, God willing. As for seeing a ship in the sea, it is evidence of the course of opinion about money and livelihood that he will enjoy, and it may be a symbol of salvation from what is disturbing. Opinion. Also, seeing waves in a dream indicates the anxiety that the dreamer feels, or it may indicate the pressures he faces at work or in life in general. Seeing yourself drowning in the sea without dying in the opinion or something bad happening is evidence of an increase in the person’s knowledge. The healthy person, while the sick person increases his illness, and God knows best. But if a person dreams that he is in the sea and dies by drowning, then this vision is not good, which indicates his distance from religion, so it is a warning message for him to return to God and repent. Interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream for a single woman: seeing the sea in a dream For a single girl, it is evidence of achieving goals and achieving the things she longed for. Seeing diving and swimming in the sea for an unmarried girl is evidence of her happiness and a life full of joy, as well as a symbol of her abundant strength. The sea also symbolizes the single girl’s dream of facilitating her marriage or the desire of a good young man to propose to her if he does not She is engaged. Among the evils of an unmarried girl seeing the sea is that seeing a bath in sea water is evidence of distress and anxiety for the unmarried girl. Drinking sea water and wanting to cool down and feeling thirsty is evidence of following a wonderful diet that she will obtain after hardships. But if you see that she is floating in the sea Until she drowns, it is evidence that she wants to satisfy some of her desires and seeks to achieve her ambitions, but she faces some obstacles on her way and confronts them, until she reaches her goal. Seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. A married woman seeing the sea and swimming in it is evidence of her high status and the achievement of her goals. But if she sees that she She used to take water from the sea to bathe with it, as this is evidence of justice, goodness, and a change in her marital life for the better, God willing. Seeing herself drinking from the sea in a married woman’s dream is a symbol of happiness, joy, and a lot of money for her and her family, and achieving what she desires. But if she sees herself drowning in sea water, this indicates However, she suffers from some problems that bother her. Seeing the sea in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing the sea in a pregnant woman’s dream is a symbol of nourishment and achieving the things she wants. Seeing the sea in a dream is evidence that God has given her to the child he wants. Seeing her drinking from the sea or Bathing in its water is evidence of her safety and ease of misfortune

title: I dreamed that I called a woman I know, so what is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: I was in contact with a woman I know. What is the meaning of the symbol of intercourse or marriage in a dream? And what did the jurists say about a man who sees in a dream intercourse with a woman he knows? What is the interpretation of a man marrying a woman from behind her? Learn about the many and varied indicators of this vision. Read the following interpretations. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site on the Internet. I dreamed that I had sex with a woman I know. I saw that I was having intercourse with my sister. So what is the meaning of the dream? The dream It indicates the livelihood and great benefit that the sister will soon receive from her brother. A man’s connection with his wife’s sister in a dream is evidence of helping her in distress or severe distress, and perhaps the vision warns him of his wife’s pregnancy, and perhaps he will become pregnant with a girl. If a man marries his colleague in a dream, the vision indicates To a business partnership that will bring them together soon and they may earn a lot of money in reality. If a man marries his mother in a dream, takes care of his mother and fulfills her demands, then the vision is not as bad as some think, and although the law prohibits incest, but seeing it in a dream translates into kindness. mutual. Between the two parties. But if a man marries his mother anally, or if he has sexual intercourse with her harshly in a dream, this indicates his disobedience to her, for he is a disobedient son, and in reality he hurts his mother a lot and makes her hers. Sad because of his harsh treatment of her. I dreamed that I had intercourse with a woman I knew from Ibn Sirin. Marriage in a man’s dream by Ibn Shirin indicates goodness and blessings, especially if the man sees that he is marrying his wife, but the marriage was according to Islamic law and not from the anus. If a man has sex with a woman, he knows that she is beautiful In a dream, he will enjoy success, living, and a lot of kindness through work. If a man sees in a dream that he is marrying a woman he knows, who has an ugly appearance, then the scene indicates sadness, loss of money, and an obstacle to achieving the desired goals. But if the man marries a woman he knows and sees... Having a wet dream in a dream is from Satan, and he is required to wash himself to prepare for prayer and to perform all religious obligations while awake. I dreamed that I was in contact with a woman I knew when I was single. I dreamed that I was in contact with a woman I knew when I was single. Is the vision benign? The scene would be benign and promising if the dreamer had sex with this woman in a hidden place, where they were both dressed. But if a man saw in a dream that he had intercourse with a woman in the market or in a place where many people were present and their bodies were exposed, then these are scandals and trials that will befall them. In fact. The name of the dreamer’s woman whom he married in a dream has a strong meaning as follows: Whether or not: If a young man marries a girl he knows and whose name is Iman in his dream, he will acquire great religiosity and faith in God Almighty. Second: And if a man marries a famous girl in a dream whose name is Jihad The vision suggests that he works hard and resists the hardships of life to achieve the desired success. Third: If he sees in a dream that he is marrying a girl named Mona, this is a sign of sustenance that comes to the dreamer from where he does not expect it. I dreamed of a

title: Interpretation of seeing an octopus in a dream

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribed Fans The octopus is a predatory sea creature. It is dangerous to approach it and see it in a dream. It has many interpretations, as it differs according to its color and how it appears in the dream. It has 8 arms and three hearts. Some stories spread that it caused many ships to sink in the sea, but it was confirmed that there is no relationship. She has it. Things that pose a danger to human life, seeing them in a dream is a cause of anxiety and stress for a person. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus by Ibn Sirin. An octopus in a dream is evidence of a traitor in the dreamer’s life. Seeing an octopus in a dream is a sign of anxiety, as is the case with murderers - evidence of getting rid of Of these troubles and problems. Whoever sees himself eating octopus meat will gain power and an important position in his currency. Check the red and white octopus inside the dream. Elements of happiness and happy news. The black octopus testifies to the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life. Anyone who sees him struggling with the octopus and trying to get rid of it will face problems and difficulties. Trying to get out of it. Seeing the hands of an octopus in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams, good health and well-being. Killing an octopus in a dream means getting out of trouble and relieving stress. A patient who sees in his dream that he is killing an octopus will soon recover from his illness. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus for a single woman. White octopus in The dream of a single girl is evidence of a man who wants to communicate with her. If an unmarried girl sees an octopus in a dream, this is a sign of money, wealth and fortune in which she will find herself, especially if it is red. Seeing a black octopus in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there is a lot of envy in Interpretation of a dream about an octopus. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus. For a pregnant woman, seeing an octopus in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of easy access to childbirth. An octopus in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a young girl. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating an octopus, she will be rich and have a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus for a married woman: A married woman sees an octopus, This indicates the marital bliss in which she lives. If a married woman sees herself attacking an octopus, she will be exposed to major marital problems and may lead to separation. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pig entering the house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pig entering a house in a dream. We may find that the interpretation of a dream about a pig entering a house in a dream is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader should prevent it and not believe it completely, because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach In the event that you see a pig inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the presence of enemies in the house. Seeing a pig entering the house in a dream may indicate some The difficulty that a person faces in his life. Dreaming of a pig inside the house in a dream may indicate the failure of the dreamer to make important decisions in his life. Seeing a pig entering the house may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer is going through at that time and he must ask God for help. title: Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and seeing a monkey chasing me in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a monkey in a dream Is seeing a monkey good or bad? Do monkeys in a dream show magic? And what does a dream about a black monkey indicate? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a monkey for unmarried, married and pregnant women according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and senior scholars of interpretation. Seeing a monkey in a dream Scholars interpreted seeing a monkey as evidence that the dreamer feels weak and helpless because he cannot regain his rights that his enemies stole from him. If the dreamer turns into a monkey, this symbolizes committing sins and transgressions, and the dream carries a message telling him to hurry up and repent before it is too late. Playing with monkeys in the vision is evidence that the owner of the dream is practicing magic and the dream is a warning to him that he will return to the Lord (Glory be to Him) to accept his repentance and forgive him. Seeing a monkey in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a monkey as a sign that the dreamer will be poor if he is rich, and if the owner of the dream sees a monkey in his dream, this means that the situation will change for the worse, and if the dreamer sees a monkey in his house but cannot catch it, this symbolizes that he will soon be robbed and he must be careful. Fighting with monkeys in the vision is a sign of chronic diseases, and if the dreamer sees a monkey If he bites him, this leads to many problems that he is currently facing with his family. As for the dream of riding a monkey, it is evidence of victory over enemies soon and the dreamer gets rid of the troubles that caused him. Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq If the dreamer sees a monkey in a dream, it symbolizes worries and sorrows approaching him and indicates a lack of his happiness, and Imam al-Sadiq interpreted the vision of female monkeys as a malicious woman in the life of the fortune teller who works magic and he must stay away from her, but if the dreamer sees a male monkey in a dream, this is an indication that he will soon be betrayed by a partner. Seeing a monkey for a merchant indicates that he will soon lose a large sum of money, so he must take care of his own affairs. Rather, he appears before him as a dear friend who cares for him and fears for his interests. The online dream interpretation site is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type the online dream interpretation site Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a monkey in a dream for a single woman Scholars interpreted seeing a monkey in a dream for an unmarried woman as evidence that she is in a relationship with a deceitful man who has bad intentions towards her and she must stay away from him. To mislead friends. If the dreamer turns into a monkey in her dream, this is a sign of her imminent marriage to a malicious man who abuses her and treats her harshly and cruelly. Do not trust anyone easily. Many disputes with her partner's family. Seeing a monkey in a dream for a married woman Scholars interpreted seeing a monkey for a married woman as an indication that her partner is greedy and stingy, does not bear responsibility and harms her in many matters. It is said that the dream of a monkey indicates that a relative will deceive her and lie to her soon, and perhaps the vision carries a message to the dreamer that she chooses her friends and acquaintances well and is not quick to trust people. And pay attention. Seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about a flood and its continuation in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about current and escaping from it in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters who wrote several books, and Ibn Sirin was the one who narrated many different interpretations of the saying. Dreams, in addition to many other interpreters and scholars, and it is also necessary to know that each dream has a different interpretation from the others, because in each dream there are many different interpretations and interpretations, and here we put the interpretation of the dream. Of a flood in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained in his book that he sees a flood in a dream, and this vision has different connotations, and here we can put what the interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates, which is what The following: A torrent in a dream, if it enters cities, indicates enemies and epidemics. Also, when a torrent destroys homes, this is a sign of a brutal enemy and destruction of the place. Also, when you interpret a dream of a torrent as a valley or a river, this indicates a person who provides protection and prevents harm from those around him. When a torrent flows Without rain, it means turmoil, money and blood are forbidden. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi gave an interpretation and interpretation of seeing a flood in a dream, as seeing a flood in a dream has many different connotations, and here we can put the most important and most prominent elements of seeing a flood in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. , which are as follows: A drenched stream in a dream indicates the enemy or the destruction of homes and spoilage of crops. Seeing a beneficial stream means that there will be benefits and subsidies with people. A torrent with rain in it is a sign of illness and travel. A torrent in a dream also indicates lies, perjury, and falsification of facts. When the sleeper sees a stream of blood This indicates the wrath of God Almighty. Swimming in the torrent toward the ground indicates liberation from the oppression of the rulers. See also: Interpretation of the dream of divorce for a married woman by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in a dream. Seeing the torrent with the valley in the dream of an unmarried woman. The single woman feels some anxiety about her future, which makes her constantly and constantly search for what It reassures her and carries some reassuring perceptions of the single woman in her dream about her future. A torrent in a dream for a single woman indicates a problem she faces in her life and she needs someone to help her get out of it. The dream also indicates that important decisions have been made that may cause problems. When she sees a clear flow, it means stability in her life. The torrent indicates To goodness, abundant sustenance, and salvation from everything that troubles him. Drowning in a stream indicates her intimate husband. Seeing heavy rain and mud in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees in her dreams many visions and dreams, among which is seeing a flood in a married woman’s dream. Here we put the interpretation of the vision related to seeing a flood in Dream of a married woman. As follows: Seeing a strong torrent in a dream indicates instability in her marital life. While seeing a calm torrent indicates that there are marital problems in her life, but she will survive them. If the flood destroys the house, this...

title: Interpretation of a dream about barley in a dream: fame and good news for a male child

preview.html: Seeing barley in a dream is usually one of the most promising dreams and a wonderful diet, especially since barley is used in preparing many foods in addition to eating it alone, and because many people are confused in interpreting the vision that passes, we provide you with many different indications and interpretations to see in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing barley in a dream for a single woman Barley is a dream that calls for optimism when it appears in the dream of an unmarried girl, because it indicates the kindness, contentment and grace that prevails in this girl’s life. If a girl eats barley in a dream, this means that she is a girl who enjoys a good reputation among people with great beauty, so it is an area that attracts the attention of everyone around her. Ibn Sirin says that the appearance of barley in a girl’s dream indicates marriage to a righteous man with whom she finds happiness in married life. If a girl sees that she is giving barley in a dream to a friend, this indicates the strength of the friendship between this girl and her friend in reality. Interpretation of seeing barley in a dream for a married woman If a married woman is facing a group of problems and concerns at the present time, seeing barley in a dream indicates that these concerns will end soon and get rid of them with this lady. If the husband offers barley to the wife, it is A righteous husband who seeks to achieve happiness and satisfaction from his wife. Offering barley to guests in a married woman's dream indicates that this lady is distinguished by generosity, generosity and giving, and this is what makes her dear to others. Seeing a large bowl containing a large amount of barley indicates that pregnancy will soon occur to this woman and this pregnancy may be for a male child. Seeing barley scattered all over the house indicates a wide diet and a lot of money in that lady's house. Seeing barley seeds in a dream about a man and its meaning If a man sees a lot of barley seeds, he will gain great wealth in the upcoming unexpected and unforeseen period. But if a person gives barley seeds to someone, this person will benefit greatly from the owner of the dream. A dish containing many barley seeds, which is presented in front of a man, indicates that he will get a good promotion at work in the near future. Planting barley in a dream indicates that this person seeks to achieve great profits and will actually be able to do so. If this man is a merchant, seeing barley seeds indicates his profit and the stagnation of his trade. Seeing barley in a dream for a pregnant woman Ibn Shaheen says that barley seeds in particular indicate the safety of the mother and the fetus, God willing. As for the distribution Barley on people in a dream, indicates the surrounding joy of this pregnant woman from pregnancy and her happiness will be complete after the birth of the newborn. As for eating barley, it is evidence of the mother’s health and portends an easy and natural birth, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing barley grains for a young man and its meaning Many dream interpreters say that barley grains in a young man’s dream indicate in particular the approach of marriage to a reliable girl. As for drinking barley, it indicates that this

title: What is the interpretation of riding a bicycle in a dream about a wheel?

preview.html: The wheel is a symbol of uprightness and walking on the right path, but some interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing it in certain dreams can be bad. Seeing Ibn Sirin riding a bicycleInterpretation of the vision Ride a bicycle in a dream It indicates the distinguished and bright future in which the dreamer finds himself. If someone sees in a dream that Riding on a steep road on a bike, this indicates the inappropriate road that the dreamer is taking. A bike in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of success and freedom from problems if you ride it on a straight road. Riding a bike in a dream shows the dreamer’s effort to overcome all the difficulties that he goes through With it.Interpretation of a dream about riding a bicycle by Nabulsi: Dreaming about riding a bicycle with someone is evidence of the correct path that the dreamer is taking, if he is walking in a straight path. It means seeing a bicycle or antenna walking with someone is an indication of participating with him in some projects. Seeing a bicycle wheel in The dream symbolizes a fair woman. Interpretation of a dream about riding bicycles for unmarried women: Seeing a bicycle in a dream is evidence of the girl’s continued success in the field of work. If a girl sees that she is riding a bicycle and going very quickly, this indicates that goals will be achieved very quickly. If an unmarried girl sees herself She falls off a bike, it means that she is losing her job or is approaching her term. If he sees a red bike in a dream, this means that he is entering a new love story. Seeing a yellow bike indicates exhaustion, anxiety, and problems that this girl is falling into. She dreams of seeing a married woman riding BicycleIf the bicycle is on a straight road, this indicates good, balanced behavior. If he sees that he is riding a bicycle and walking on a road full of obstacles, this indicates that he will fall into some marital problems. Seeing a man riding a wheelRiding a wheel in a man’s dream indicates haste in making decisions. The difficulty of riding a bike is evidence of the difficulties that this man is going through. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.
